author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: The Four Seasons in New York offering housing to medical staff for free
description: 'I heard Governor Cuomo's call to action during one of his press conferences, and there was no other option for us but do whatever we could to help'
content:
Medical staff in New York will be offered free housing at the luxury Four Seasonshotel in Manhattan, amid the coronaviruspandemic.
Governor Andrew Cuomo revealed that the five-star hotel would be providing accommodation to medical professionals for free, in … [+1787 chars]
